intro: Hey, Jude ! I knew you would come !
You didn't left me any choice... What's the matter ?
Look ! I've just made a new ship ! Look, she's all shiny ! She uses the latest Reno's Uberfaster ! You HAVE to try it !
I decided to never put my hand on a ship again, Maria, you're wasting our time.
But, please ! With the Cutie Mach, you'll even be able to take your revenge on Regis Veule ! Don't tell me you wanna see this dickhead on the topscreen forever !

So, it's set. Do you remember ? Use UP to Climb, DOWN to Dive, RIGHT to Accelerate and LEFT to Brake. Adjust your speed to the difficulty of the map but beware, if you speed down too much (under 2000), you won't earn any points ! The faster you go, the greater the score is.
I know how to drive a ship and manage a race...
So, prove it to me ! Catch the more tokens with the highest speed to maximise your score !
fail_lvl1: Oh my, you're really rusted ! That's not good enough.
win_lvl1: Told ya I didn't need you to pilot the Cutie Mach...
lvl_2: So, what did ya think about your first dive into the town circuits ? You liked it, don't try to lie to me.
... It was fun... I'm not used anymore to the adrenaline rush, I'm far from this stuff, now.
Please, Jude, it's only been three MONTHS ! Don't be overdramatic... Are you ready for the next lesson ?
Are you sure I need it ?

Now we're going to practice stretching and shrinking the Cutie Mach. Lock yourself on the middle of the map, then deploy your modules one step at a time, following the markers. Once you're at full size, retract your modules in the same fashion.

The training pattern will repeat itself twice, then you're on your own. Trying climbing and diving in sync once your reach the tunnels. The last part expects you to stretch as wide as you can, and get yourself aligned with the pellets.
Yeah, yeah, I know all this already. Been there, done that. I also remember what used to happen to the poor bastards that didn't align themselves properly through the last section...
fail_lvl2: Please, Jude, are you even trying ?
win_lvl2: Jude, you were awesome ! I'm beginning to think you'll be able to take her to the FFGCC ! Let's do more training !
Please, I'm already ready for the tournament...
lvl_3: I promise it's the last training map before the FFGCC ! The Walls are your second nemesis before Regis. Have the right shape to cross the obstacles. The Cutie Mach have the new collision detection device, you will be warned when a wall comes. The walls can cross the ship if the modules have the right spacing.
I don't need a stupid device, I'll use my intuition, as always...
Don't disrespect the awesomeness of my baby, please. And don't ruin the paintjob !
fail_lvl3: The booze must have ruin your brain...
win_lvl3: Perfect ! Let's get ready for the Fast-Forward Galactic Cup Championship !
lvl_4: So, you're back ! I don't feel like I can worry for it, you'll quit again at the first problem, that's what you've done the last time...
Don't take the victory for granted.
Don't dream, dude. You don't know it yet, but you're already dead.
fail_lvl4: I've never expected something else from a looser like you, but I feel a bit disapointed...
win_lvl4: Pff ! Lady Luck must have had pity of a looser like you. You won't get so cocky next time.
lvl_5: you're doing good ! But focus, and don't let Regis upset you. There is other competitors in the race.
I don't forget it. But he'll know his pain when I'll kick is spandex-thightened ass out of the ring.
When did you have time to look that part of him ?
fail_lvl5: Oh, The Cutie Mach is all wrecked... But you're not hurt, let's see the bright side of the situation ! You'll have your revenge latter...
win_lvl5: Jude ! I knew you'll pown the races ! Your odds are still growing !
lvl_6: Maria ? I'm really surprised Jude was able to drive a ship again. After his catastrophic failure (see README.md for more explanations), I thought he would never come back... Will he be ok ?
Oh, you care for him ? It's so sweet from you ! But don't worry, Emo-boy, Jude is perfectly able to kick your ass.
I don't care for him ! I hope he'll crash so hard his own mother won't be able to recognize him ! I only want a fair victory, this time !
win_lvl6: Get lost ! You may be good, but I'm still better than you !
lvl_7: How could you win all this ! I'm the best ! I won't let you ruin my career, after leaving me like that ! I've always tried to defeat you, and when we had finally a chance to battle, you left me ! I wanted you to know that I was better than you, I didn't wan't a victory stained by your abandon !
... (I didn't know he would be so much obsessed with me... Should I worry ?)
I'll never let you take my title ! It's my chance ! You'll have to take me seriously after that !
fail_lvl7: Ah ! I've told you I was the best ! Come again when you want, crybaby, I'll take you the exact same way you like it.
Next time, you'll eat your teeth...
win_lvl7: Y... you defeated me ! I trained restless and...
Regis, stop that. You don't need to win any race to proove me you are a great pilot. I've always know it. But... It's not really what you want me to see, is it ?
I... I don't know what you're speaking about.
I should have known before... I'm sorry I've made you suffer like that. Let me redeem my faults. Do you want us to be friends ?
Oh, Jude... You're far more important than any champion title...
... It's easy to say, for the looser...
